coreAtributes.name: latex arm warmers
coreAtributes.description: A pair of latex arm warmers that hooks around the middle finger.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the arm warmers over [npc.her] forearms and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the arm warmers over [npc2.namePos] forearms and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.namePos] forearms through the arm warmers and hastily [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc.her] arm warmers and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc2.namePos] arm warmers and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] at the straps on [npc2.namePos] arm warmers until they're loose enough and [npc.verb(toss)] them aside.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the arm warmers over [npc.her] forearms and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the arm warmers over [npc2.namePos] forearms and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
